languages.text: {n}Арджента останавливает восторженный монолог Октавианы легким жестом.{/n} "Довольно. Я ищу воздаяния грешникам за дела их, а не славы". {n}Несмотря на слова сестры, от вас не укрывается огонек в ее взгляде — Ардженте приятно восхищенное внимание.{/n}

{n}Argenta stops Octaviana's torrent of adoration with a calm gesture.{/n} "No more. I seek retribution against transgressors, not glory for myself." {n}Despite her words, you catch a glint in Argenta's eyes — you can tell she is enjoying this enraptured attention.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента останавливает восторженный монолог Октавианы легким жестом.{/n} "Довольно. Я ищу воздаяния грешникам за дела их, а не славы". {n}Несмотря на слова сестры, от вас не укрывается огонек в ее взгляде — Ардженте приятно восхищенное внимание.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta stops Octaviana's torrent of adoration with a calm gesture.{/n} "No more. I seek retribution for trespassers, not glory for myself." {n}In spite of her words, you catch a slight glint in Argenta's eyes — you can tell she is enjoying this enraptured attention.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは落ち着いた所作でオクタヴィアナのとめどない崇敬を遮った。{/n}「もういい。我の目的は反逆者に対する報復であって、自身の名誉などではない」{n}その言葉にもかかわらず、アルジェンタの瞳に微かな輝きが見て取れた…オクタヴィアナ受けるうっとりとしたまなざしが嬉しいようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stops Octaviana's torrent of adoration with a calm gesture.{/n} "No more. I seek retribution against transgressors, not glory for myself." {n}Despite her words, you catch a glint in Argenta's eyes — you can tell she is enjoying this enraptured attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは落ち着いた所作でオクタヴィアナのとめどない崇敬を遮った。{/n}「もういい。我の目的は反逆者に対する報復であって、自身の名誉などではない」{n}その言葉にもかかわらず、アルジェンタの瞳に微かな輝きが見て取れた…オクタヴィアナ受けるうっとりとしたまなざしが嬉しいようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'un geste calme, Argenta interrompt le torrent d'adoration d'Octaviana.{/n} « Assez. Je cherche à punir les transgresseurs, pas à me couvrir de gloire. » {n}Malgré ses paroles, vous remarquez une lueur dans le regard d'Argenta : visiblement, elle apprécie la fascination dont elle fait l'objet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stops Octaviana's torrent of adoration with a calm gesture.{/n} "No more. I seek retribution against transgressors, not glory for myself." {n}Despite her words, you catch a glint in Argenta's eyes — you can tell she is enjoying this enraptured attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un geste calme, Argenta interrompt le torrent d'adoration d'Octaviana.{/n} « Assez. Je cherche à punir les intrus, pas à me couvrir de gloire. » {n}Malgré ses paroles, vous remarquez une petite lueur dans le regard d'Argenta : visiblement, elle apprécie la fascination dont elle fait l'objet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔以平静的手势，打断了奥克塔维娜狂热的崇拜。{/n}“到此为止吧。我这么做只是为了让那些恶人得到报应，并不是为了我自己的荣耀。”{n}尽管她嘴上这么说，但你还是在阿洁塔的目光中看到了明亮的光彩。看得出来，这种如痴如狂的目光让她很是受用。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stops Octaviana's torrent of adoration with a calm gesture.{/n} "No more. I seek retribution against transgressors, not glory for myself." {n}Despite her words, you catch a glint in Argenta's eyes — you can tell she is enjoying this enraptured attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔以平静的手势，打断了奥克塔维娜狂热的崇拜。{/n}“到此为止吧。我这么做只是为了让那些恶人得到报应，并不是为了我自己的荣耀。”{n}尽管她嘴上这么说，但你还是在阿洁塔的目光中看到了一丝光彩。看得出来，这种如痴如狂的目光让她很是受用。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta unterbricht Octavianas Bewunderungstirade mit einer ruhigen Geste.{/n} "Genug davon! Ich will Vergeltung für Eindringlinge, nicht Ruhm für mich selbst." {n}Trotz ihrer Worte bemerkst du ein Funkeln in Argentas Augen – sie genießt die Verehrung und Aufmerksamkeit durchaus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stops Octaviana's torrent of adoration with a calm gesture.{/n} "No more. I seek retribution against transgressors, not glory for myself." {n}Despite her words, you catch a glint in Argenta's eyes — you can tell she is enjoying this enraptured attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta unterbricht Octavianas Bewunderungstirade mit einer ruhigen Geste.{/n} "Genug davon! Ich will Strafe für Eindringlinge, nicht Ruhm für mich selbst." {n}Trotz ihrer Worte bemerkst du ein leichtes Funkeln in Argentas Augen – sie genießt die Verehrung und Aufmerksamkeit durchaus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta interrumpe el discurso de adoración de Octaviana con un gesto tranquilizador.{/n} «No siga. Solo busco el castigo de las transgresiones, no ganar prestigio». {n}A pesar de lo que ha dicho Argenta, detectas un destello en sus ojos que prueba que está disfrutando de los fervientes elogios recibidos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stops Octaviana's torrent of adoration with a calm gesture.{/n} "No more. I seek retribution against transgressors, not glory for myself." {n}Despite her words, you catch a glint in Argenta's eyes — you can tell she is enjoying this enraptured attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta interrumpe el discurso de adoración de Octaviana con un gesto tranquilizador.{/n} «No siga. Solo busco el castigo de los intrusos, no ganar prestigio». {n}A pesar de lo que ha dicho Argenta, detectas un leve destello en sus ojos que prueba que está disfrutando de los fervientes elogios recibidos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta, sakin bir el hareketiyle Octaviana'nın hayranlık selini yarıda kesiyor.{/n} "Bu kadarı kâfi. Amacım şan şöhret edinmek değil, günahkârlardan öcümüzü almaktır." {n}Dili ne söylerse söylesin, Argenta'nın gözlerinde bir parıltı yakalıyorsun. Bu coşku dolu ilginin hoşuna gittiği belli.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stops Octaviana's torrent of adoration with a calm gesture.{/n} "No more. I seek retribution against transgressors, not glory for myself." {n}Despite her words, you catch a glint in Argenta's eyes — you can tell she is enjoying this enraptured attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, soğukkanlı tek bir hareketiyle Octaviana'nın hayranlık selini yarıda kesiyor.{/n} "Bu kadar yeter. Kendim için şan şöhret değil, günahkârların cezalandırılmasını istiyorum." {n}O her ne söylerse söylesin, Argenta'nın gözlerinde bir parıltı gözüne takılıyor... Coşku dolu bu ilgiden hoşlandığı belli.{/n}
